messages.content: What is the SaltAI custom node and what does it provide for users?
The SaltAI custom node contains various nodes for use with their platform, as well as custom nodes that help users achieve new dynamics in their workflows.
Can custom nodes be installed without the Salt repo?
Yes, some custom nodes can be installed without the Salt repo.
What is the name of a self-contained custom node provided by SaltAI?
SaltAI-OPAC-ComfyUI is one of the self-contained custom nodes provided by SaltAI.
